short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto change Youtube™ audio track to your preference

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you enjoy watching YouTube™ channels in languages other than your own but struggle with YouTube defaulting the audio to your native language? Our extension, "YouTube™ Default Audio Track", is here to enhance your viewing experience. It effortlessly switches the audio track to your preferred language, allowing you to enjoy content the way it was intended.

Features
- Easily set and save your preferred language for audio tracks, so you can always hear your favorite channels in the language of your choice as long as it is provided in video.
- Choose from the original language of the video or any available dubbed audio tracks.

If you interest in how it work, feel free to check source code here:
https://github.com/Cheersupzoo/yt-default-audio-track
